
    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());



    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {



    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)

            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)

        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)

        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);

       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩

       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();

        }

    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)




    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());



    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {



    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();

            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();

        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";

            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)




    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());



    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {



    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {

    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }

            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {

        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)




    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());



    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {



    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    {

        return FilePath.substr(pos);

        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }

       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();

       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {

        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);

        {
            strCodeInfo = "";

            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();

    }

    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());

        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)

        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());

        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();

       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

    {

        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";




    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    //解压缩
    void UnCompressFile(const string filePath)
    {
        FILE* fIn = fopen(filePath.c_str(),"r");
        assert(fIn);

        string strFilePostFix;
        ReadLine(fIn,strFilePostFix);
        string strLineCount;
        ReadLine(fIn,strLineCount);
        size_t lineCount = atoi(strLineCount.c_str());
        string strCodeInfo;
        for(size_t i = 0; i < lineCount; ++i)
        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }

    string GetFilePath(string FilePath)
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(0,pos);
    }

        {
            strCodeInfo = "";
            ReadLine(fIn,strCodeInfo);
            _charInfo[(unsigned char)strCodeInfo[0]]._count = atoi(strCodeInfo.c_str() + 2);
        }
        HuffmanTree<CharInfo> ht(_charInfo,256,CharInfo(0));
       HuffmanTreeNode<CharInfo>* pCur = ht.GetRoot();
       string compressFilePath = GetFilePath(filePath);
       compressFilePath += strFilePostFix;

       FILE* fOut = fopen(compressFilePath.c_str(),"w");
       assert(fOut);
    {
    {
    {
        size_t pos = FilePath.find_last_of('.');
        return FilePath.substr(pos);
    }
